price: Maka barang siapa mengada-adakan dusta terhadap Allah213 sesudah itu, maka merekalah orang-orang yang zalim.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: 213.  Dusta terhadap Allah ialah dengan mengatakan bahwa sebelum Taurat diturunkan, Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā telah mengharamkan beberapa makanan kepada Bani Isrā`īl.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: famani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba min baʿdi dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
